name: Single Wash (Max. 6 clothes)
details: Order a quality wash and get your cloth (max. 6 pieces) returned to you in less than 48 hours for NGN 1,200. You also recieve 200 bonus any wash points!! You can use these to get discounted washes. T'c and C's apply
